CheckTitle: Ensure image tag is set to Fixed â€“ not Latest or Blank
CheckType: Software and Configuration Checks/Kubernetes Best Practices
Description: Ensure container images use fixed tags (not 'latest' or blank) or are referenced by digest for reproducible and auditable deployments.
Risk: Using floating image tags can make deployments non-reproducible and introduce unexpected changes or vulnerabilities.

Code.NativeIaC:
# Example: use image: repo/image:1.2.3 or image@sha256:<digest>
containers:
- name: app
  image: myrepo/myapp:1.2.3
Code.Other: 1. Pin image tags in manifests or use image digests (sha256) to ensure immutability.

Recommendation.Text: Use explicit image tags or digests for deployment manifests; avoid 'latest' or omitted tags.

Notes: Image digests (sha256) are recommended for immutability and reproducibility.
